Home.title: Save your love and celebrate your story.
Home.paragraph: Turn moments into memories that will last forever.

purpose.title: What is the purpose of Couplespace?
purpose.description: Couplespace was created to be a virtual space for couples, allowing you to express your love for your partner in a unique way.

howDoesItWork.title: How does Couplespace work?
howDoesItWork.firstStep: Log in using your Google account.
howDoesItWork.secondStep: After logging in, you will be redirected to your dashboard.
howDoesItWork.thirdStep: In the dashboard, you can create, edit, and view your page, receive the QR Code by email, and add your partnerâ€™s email so they can also make posts.

fileStorage.title: How does image storage work?
fileStorage.description: We use free Firebase Storage, and to avoid costs, each page has a limit of 6 images in a gallery. Posts do not support images.

Login.title: Login
Login.assistantText: Log in using one of the methods below

Dashboard.noPageFound: You don't have a page yet!

error.aboutYou: About you field must be at least 10 characters

Invitation.text: You have been invited to Couplespace! Click the link to check your couple page and make login:
